answers.author: Christopher Lawrence
answers.text:
Check out Roanoke County and Roanoke City, Virginia.  They both completed extensive P&R system wide master plans and service specific ones, and are about 90,000 each.  Both are award winning department and the City is Nationally Certified.

author: Sarah Tews
text:
I'm looking for comparable organizations who have developed a recreation specific master plan. What process did you go through to determine who you would choose as a consultant? What was your process to hire them? May we obtain a copy of your Recreation Master Plan?
Please note: I am refereing to a recreation specific master plan, not your department or organization's comprehensive master plan. 
Our organization services a city of nearly 100,000.
Thank you
title: Recreation Master Plan
